dict.string:
Gym Workouts: (Lower Body) 60-90 sec rest between sets
1. Leg Press: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 2. Lying Leg Curl: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 3. Seated Leg Curl: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 4. Standing Calf Raise: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 5. Seated Calf Raise: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets

Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then:
1. Jog 800m (or 5 minutes) 2. Walk 400m (or 3 minutes) 3. Jog 1.2km (or 8 minutes) 4. Walk 400m (or 3 minutes) 5. Jog 800m (or 5 minutes)

Gym Workouts: (Upper Body) 60 - 90 sec rest between sets
1. Barbell Bench Press: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 2. Dumbbell Flyes: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 3. Overhead Dumbbell Press: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 4. Lat Pulldown: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 5. Dumbbell Lateral Rise: Reps - 8,10,12 for 3 sets 6. Barbell Bicep Curls: Reps - 8,10,12 for 3 sets 7. Preacher Curl with Cable: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 8. Triceps Extension: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 9. Rope Pressdown: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets

Bodyweight Exercise:
1. Brisk five-minute warmup walk
2. Then jog 4km (or 25 minutes).
